Description: The power to manipulate, generate, absorb, and convert energy.
The power to live eternally and never die.
The power to utilize supernatural forces to potentially achieve any effect one desires.
The power to manipulate anything in the universe that has substance and physical form.
The power to be supremely almighty and invincible, holding infinite power with almost no limitations.
The power to be absolutely anywhere and everywhere.
The power to possess absolute and infinite knowledge of everything.
The power to manipulate probability, luck, and even the course of destiny itself.
The power to manipulate all of reality.
The power to move, manipulate or otherwise interact with objects with one's mind.
The power to manipulate, stop, reverse, accelerate, or alter time.
The power to absorb or steal powers from others.
The ability to enhance the powers of oneself or others.
The ability to bestow powers upon another.
The power to nullify other powers.
The power to replicate the powers of others.
The power to transform into animals.
The power to breathe underwater.
The power to manipulate the bones within one's body.
The power to manipulate one's density.
The ability to stretch, deform, expand, or contract one's body into any form imaginable.
The power to transform into or have a physical body made up of inorganic elements.
The ability to achieve complete and utter accuracy on distant targets.
The ability to possess agility and reflexes beyond that of peak human potential.
The power to possess durability beyond that of peak human potential.
The power to hear sounds far beyond that of peak human potential.
The power to possess a long lifespan and decelerate aging.
The power to possess extremely accurate senses.
The power to possess speed beyond that of peak human potential.
The power to possess stamina and endurance beyond that of peak human potential.
The power to possess a level of strength beyond that of beyond that of peak human potential.
The power to heal physical injuries or diseases.
The power to create and shape illusions.
The ability to phase through physical matter.
The power to render oneself unable to be seen.
The power to be completely immune to all forms of physical harm.
The ability to create clones of oneself.
The power to completely change and reshape one's physical form.
The power to increase or decrease the size of oneself.
The power to possess proficiency, capabilities and knowledge in weapons beyond that of peak human potential.
The power to see through practically anything.
The power to fully interpret and replicate the emotions, moods, and temperaments of others.
The power of extremely heightened and enhanced intelligence and other mental abilities.
The power to control the minds of others.
The power to perceive future events.
The power to mentally communicate with other minds.
The power to separate one's spirit from the body.
The power to manipulate the flow of vital energy in the physical body.
The power to acquire information using sight outside the normal range of detection.
The power to perceive and communicate with spirits and those who are in the afterlife.
The power to inhabit the bodies of other beings.
The power to bring the deceased back to life.
The power to manipulate air.
The power to manipulate animals.
The power to manipulate darkness.
The power to manipulate earth.
The power to manipulate electricity.
The power to manipulate fire.
The power to manipulate gravity.
The power to manipulate ice.
The power to manipulate light.
The power to manipulate metal.
The power to manipulate plants.
The power to manipulate water.
The power to manipulate the weather.
The power to travel between different dimensions.
The power to fly without any outside influence.
The power to create portals for transport between two non-adjacent locations.
The power to move instantaneously from one location to another without physically occupying the space in between.
The ability to travel through time.
The power to fasten onto and climb vertical and horizontal surfaces without falling.
The ability to discharge energy onto a specific target.
The power to create solid constructs from pure energy.
The ability to project powerful fields of manipulated energy.
The power to generate beams of heat from one's eyes.
The power to manipulate radioactive decay and radiation spectra.
The power to emit a highly enhanced scream of a high amplitude.
The power to manipulate technology.
